name: 電腦與語言教學
comment: 上課教室在雲和街大樓二樓，地址為雲和街1號(位於雲和小火鍋斜對面、Cafe a la mode正對面)，從師大側門右轉看見Starbucks右轉進入巷子步行約2分鐘(130公尺)，右手邊就會看到雲和街大樓，亦可使用Google Maps APP查詢位置。請同學使用學生證感應，進出雲和街上課教室。
description:
A research topic list 

1. AIML 
2. Grammar checker evaluation- Several possible topics 
3. SynctoLearn evaluation 
4. TTS evaluation for Listening purposes 
5. ASR system evaluation like MyET or Else? 
6. Text ladder evaluation 
7. Evaluation of video conferencing systems for language learning 
8. evaluating Moodle as course platform 
9. evaluation of Collocation tool for v and writing 
10. evaluation of large corpus search engines? 
11. evaluation of Cell phone for language learning 
12. evaluation of Pocket PC for language learning 
13. evolution of laptop for language learning 
14. evaluation of online dictionaries for reading 
15. evaluation of CMC as tool of learning video or chartrooms 
16. cross cultural exchanges 
17. evaluating learning in second life 
18. evaluating a popular game for SL learners. 
More can be added to the list here.
goals: to have solid understanding about CALL.
